feed.title: Burgess Lab
feed.subtitle: Genetic and imaging approaches to neural circuits and behavior

entry.title: Woods Hole in Winter
entry.content: Harry and Reid spent the week teaching students how to label and ablate Mauthner neurons. Brown University neuroscience graduate students visit Woods Hole to gain hands-on experience with different experimental systems. We had a great time interacting with students, and using a high speed camera to measure zebrafish and human startle latencies!
entry.summary: Harry and Reid spent the week teaching students how to label and ablate Mauthner neurons. Brown University neuroscience graduate students visit Woods Hole to gain hands-on experience with different experimental systems. We had a great time interacting with students, and using a high speed camera to measure zebrafish and human startle latencies! Woods Hole in Winter is a little bleak, but still beautiful!

entry.title: Finally a new website
entry.content:
Finally, thanks to the fantastic Lab Website Template, I’ve been able to put together a nice looking lab website - welcome all! Many thanks to the Greene Laboratory for putting together a markup-based website builder, that makes coding and updating a lab website quick and easy.

Our official NICHD website has more detail (at least for now!), but is challenging to keep up-to-date.
entry.summary: Finally, thanks to the fantastic Lab Website Template, I’ve been able to put together a nice looking lab website - welcome all! Our official NICHD website has more detail (at least for now!), but is challenging to keep up-to-date.
